title: So, I know Camille (new champ) was just announced but...
body: I think it's pretty safe to say she "roller skates"/skids her way around the rift. At first I was like how tf does she walk? Does she awkwardly sink her blades into the terrain after each step or something? Although I said "it's pretty safe to say", she might end up flying or something lul.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=False 001,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AIgpjjEs,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-11-18T00:35:08.307+0000)
>
> At first I was like how tf does she walk? 

https://i.gyazo.com/7b272162a544230d6d8d454bf9092fe5.gif
Ah YES forgot about fiddle. To be fair fiddle does walk like a complete idiot. He wobbles side to side and somehow manages to move forward...
The walk of champions must only belong to Fiddlesticks, he owns it with finesse.

I just want to know if she has a quote for boots along the lines of "You realize I'm going to have to immediately return these, right?"
She'll probably have quotes for talon, considering he has nothing but knives, aka her legs(basically)
Wait even I didn't vote yes, I voted yasuo is cancer...
well elise and fiddle walk on sticks too. Blades arent different.
i dont think so since she doesn't have wheels on her feet just sharp edges i think shell kind of tip toe around
